channel.title: How do you change the port pimpscape listens too
channel.description:
Im a newbie at servers. When I launch pimpscape, [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/9781/trojanblockedyi5.png[/img][/URL]
It blocks it. I went into server.java and searched for 5555 and found this [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img125.imageshack.us/img125/4776/portchangeeu7.png[/img][/URL]
and still
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/9781/trojanblockedyi5.png[/img][/URL]
What do i do?

item.title: How do you change the port pimpscape listens too
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

did you compile after you changed? oh yeah and you need to put that in your exceptions. Go to your firewall settings then you will see exeptions and add the port your server is running on, oh yeah and disable firewalls.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the port pimpscape listens too

item.title: How do you change the port pimpscape listens too
item.dc:creator: @erik_teh_viking erik teh viking
item.description:
@erik_teh_viking wrote:

I turned off my firewall and tried it, worked on my client. Turned on the firewall, and it worked (for some reason it wasn’t working before). now I’ll try it on another computer.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the port pimpscape listens too

have you got a firewall try turning it off or you could just turn the antivirus of for the moment
